summary: THE CAR BEGAN JUMPING AND JERKING AS IT ACCELERATED ON BOTH THE INTERSTATE AND CITY STREETS.  I WAS CERTAINLY NOT IN CONTROL.  THE TACHOMETER KEPT ACCELERATING AND DECELERATING ON ITS OWN.  AFTER I ACCELERATED TO ABOVE 45-50, IT STOPPED JERKING AND BECAME SMOOTH AGAIN.  UPON STOPPING AT A STOP LIGHT OR SIGN, THE VEHICLE WAS JERKY AND HAD TROUBLE ENGAGING AND SHIFTING.  IT WAS EXTREMELY DANGEROUS.
